SHOPIFY | Developer Acceleration - Developer Analytics Lead | Ottawa (Canada) | ONSITE

Do you have a solid understanding of data as a discipline? Our Developer Acceleration team makes Shopify’s developers faster and happier - we need a strong developer analytics lead to build out this new wing of our team.

This is a role for you if you want to take on the challenge of making the Shopify development team more productive and efficient as it grows, and to share what you learn publicly to advance the industry.

Apply here: https://www.shopify.com/careers/developer-acceleration-devel...

SHOPIFY | Production Engineer - RPC Team | Ottawa, Toronto, Montreal (Canada) | ONSITE

The Service Communication team at Shopify is responsible for defining, coordinating and monitoring all service-to-service network communication at Shopify.

So far, we’ve built a Ruby-based GraphQL RPC client that’s in general availability for the company. We’ve been prototyping a service mesh to give us full control over how data flows through the system. We’ve got big plans for how we’re going to use the service mesh to add resiliency to all apps at Shopify.

Apply here: https://www.shopify.com/careers/production-engineer-scalabil...
